com.tonbeller.jpivot.table.span
Class Span

java.lang.Object
  com.tonbeller.jpivot.table.span.Span
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Span
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

contains info about one cell of an table axis.
